item.description:
CT ROCK Climbers!

Join the Ragged Mountain Foundation and the Access Fund as we Adopt a Crag!

Cleanup Pinnacle Rock on Sat, December 1, 2012

 

 

 

 

 

 

Pinnacle Rock is one of Connecticuts best moderate crags but as you know the place gets trashed with litter, graffiti, fire rings, ATV's and impacts from hikers and climbers.

For more information and directions to the meeting place, visit http://raggedmtn.org/overlook/adopt-a-crag-pinnacle-rock

The RMF is providing LUNCH, garbage bags, tools, etc.  Just bring your personal items, water, work gloves and a good attitude.

If time and weather allows we'll climb when the work is done!

Hope to see you there! Please share.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at the Starbucks parking lot then carpool back to the climbing area.
item.name: Adopt a Crag: Pinnacle Rock
